update IMOS_LO_Task_History
Task_No = #{任务编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
List_No = #{单据编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGV_Code = #{AGV编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Task_Type = #{任务类型, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Task_Status = #{任务状态, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Task_Priority = #{任务优先级, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
List_DetailNo = #{单据明细编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Code = #{物料编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Name = #{物料名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Type_Code = #{类型代码, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Type_Name = #{类型名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Spec = #{物料规格, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Start_Station = #{起始站点, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
End_Station = #{目的站点, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Batch_No = #{批次, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Qty = #{数量, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
Remark = #{备注, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Start_Time = #{开始时间, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
End_Time = #{结束时间, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Task_No = #{任务编号}
